channel.title: What's the difference?
channel.description:
I was wondering what the difference was between:
public static int hats[] and public static int fullHelm[] and public static int fullMask[]
or
public static int body[] and public static int platebody[]???
In item(4).java...

item.title: What's the difference?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X

item.title: What's the difference?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

hats = hats
fullHelm = full helms
fullMask = masks, like halloween masks and shit

body = bodies
platebody = plated armour

Read full topic

item.title: What's the difference?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“X F U R Y X, post:1, topic:154051”]I was wondering what the difference was between:

public static int hats[]
and
public static int fullHelm[]
and
public static int fullMask[]

or

public static int body[]
and
public static int platebody[]???

In item(4).java…[/quote]

First one, is, like for phats, that sit on top of head… If its like, a skillcape hood, that covers face, you add to FullMask aswell as hats… Full helm… Not sure of. Think its like FullMask…

PlateBody and Body, are the same i think. But you need to add the item in both, to make it not glitched.

Read full topic
